infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Floq uses the microphone ONLY to measure ambient noise levels so it can suggest a matching vibe. Audio is never recorded or stored.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Floq analyses your device motion to recognise walking or dancing patterns and suggest a vibe that matches your activity.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Floq uses your location to show nearby people and places that fit your current vibe. Precise location is never shared publicly without consent.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Floq may connect to Bluetooth sensors to enhance vibe detection accuracy and provide richer activity insights.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Floq may connect to Bluetooth sensors to enhance vibe detection accuracy and provide richer activity insights.
